name: John Eggen
what_you_do: John Robert Eggen helps innovative and socially-conscious experts, professionals, and entrepreneurs achieve their missions through publishing and marketing programs.
who_you_serve: His clients include transformationally-oriented professionals, teachers, trainers, business owners, and world-renowned experts.
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, courses, speaking, consulting
current_projects: FREE Downloadable Guide for writing a transformational book
bio: John has been featured in leading industry publications like Publishers Weekly and has appeared on various radio and television shows across the U.S. and Canada.
business_focus: John Robert Eggen helps innovative and socially-conscious experts, professionals, and entrepreneurs achieve their missions through publishing and marketing programs.
